title: The Awakening
description: After thousands of years, a woman awakens from a block of ice which melts away. She has no idea of who she is or why she was frozen. In fact, she may be the last of her kind. Alone is a serial short story which follows a woman who had been frozen in ice for thousands of years. This is her journey to find out what happened. Along the way, she will meet brave allies, unusual and magical creatures, dangerous beasts, legendary monsters, and evil enemies, as she travels and learns about the world she awoke in, with the hope that one day she can fill the emptiness that is in her heart, and to answer the question if she is, truly, alone.A new short story episode is released every week.
author: Hugo C. Bygott
